casaxml.task:
Open the pipeline weblog in a browser h_weblog opens the weblog in a new browser tab or window.
The pipeline operating mode The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.
automatic
automatic interactive getinputs
Relative path to weblog index.html Relative path to the weblog index file. This file must be located in a child directory of the CASA working directory. If relpath is left unspecified, the most recent weblog will be located and displayed.
Examples
1. Open the most recent weblog
h_weblog()
2. Open the specified weblog
h_weblog(relpath='pipeline-procedure_hifa_calimage/html/t1-1.html') void
